sentence.Network_en: Life is not all beer and skittles.

entry.def: A skittle is a wooden object used as a target in the game of skittles.
Skittles is a game in which players try to knock over as many skittles as they can out of a group of nine by rolling a ball at them.

means.word_mean: 1. bowling down an alley at a target of nine wooden pins

list.explanation: 很容易的事，吃喝玩乐，享受

example.en: Did you think life was all beer and skittles?
example.zh: 你以为生活就是吃喝玩乐吗？
